author: Ben Knight
title: The biggest workforce upheaval since WWII could be a gamechanger for women
description: The coronavirus pandemic could spark a work-from-home revolution that lasts well beyond the health crisis. And one economist says it's overwhelmingly women who would benefit.
content:
Posted 
April 09, 2020 06:04:17
Heather Renton never planned on working from home, let alone starting up her own organisation.
But she was forced into it after her employer gave her an impossible choice she could keep her job, or care for her disabled daug… [+4355 chars]
